data.title: Wonderful Experience. Wow !!
data.review: This is a very nice car. Go for it. I would definitely recommend this.

data.title: Simply Awesome !! It is heavenly !
data.review: This is what you expect from a super car. 100Mph in just 5 secs. Superb.

data.title: It is Awesome !
data.review: It is worth buying. Had an amazing experience.I never had any problems till date. It feels Awesome.
